Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.3.1.A.1.1

description.narrative: Extent to which operational institutions have the capacity to support fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations
